Kemenkumham Buka 4.598 Formasi CPNS 2019, Simak Syaratnya
01 Nov 2019, 06:57 by Bisnis.com, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kementerian Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia atau Kemenkumham membuka formasi penerimaan untuk calon pegawai negeri sipil atau CPNS 2019. Pada tahun ini Kemenkumham membuka 4.598 formasi di berbagai bidang.
Dari total tersebut, kementerian ini menerima para CPNS 2019 untuk ditempatkan pada 14 unit kerja. Keempat belas unit kerja yang dimaksud adalah:
1. Sekretariat Jenderal
2. Direktorat Jenderal Peraturan Perundang-undangan
3. Direktorat Jenderal Administrasi Hukum Umum
4. Direktorat Jenderal Pemasyarakatan
5. Direktorat Jenderal Imigrasi
6. Direktorat Jenderal Kekayaan Intelektual
7. Direktorat Jenderal Hak Asasi Manusia
8. Inspektorat Jenderal
9. Badan Pembinaan Hukum Nasional
10. Badan Penelitian dan Pengembangan Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia
11. Badan Pengembangan Sumber Daya Manusia Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia
12. Politeknik Ilmu Pemasyarakatan
13. Politeknik Imigrasi
14. Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Hukum dan Hak Asasi Manusia
Adapun sejumlah kantor wilayah Kemenkumham yang membuka penerimaan CPNS 2019 adalah: Aceh, Sumatera Utara, Sumatera Barat, Riau, Jambi, Sumatera Selatan, Kepulauan Bangka Belitung, Bengkulu, Lampung dan Kepulauan Riau. Selain itu kantor wilayah Kemenkumham lainnya adalah Banten, DKI Jakarta, Jawa Barat, Jawa Tengah, D.I. Yogyakarta dan Jawa Timur.
Sementara kantor wilayah Kemenkumham yang membuka penerimaan CPNS 2019 lainnya adalah Kalimantan Barat, Kalimantan Timur, Kalimantan Tengah, Kalimantan Selatan, Bali, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Nusa Tenggara Barat, Gorontalo, Sulawesi Utara, Sulawesi Tengah, Sulawesi Selatan, Sulawesi Tenggara, Sulawesi Barat, Maluku, Maluku Utara, Papua, Papua Barat.
Kemenkumham membuka 23 jabatan guna menampung para CPNS. Lowongan dibuka untuk sejumlah lulusan mulai dari SLTA sederajat, D-III, Sarjana, Dokter Umum dan Perawat.
Lulusan SLTA juga mendapat kesempatan mengikuti tes. Lulusan SLTA sederajat dapat mendaftar pada jabatan Penjaga Tahana serta Pemeriksa Keimigrasian Pelaksana/Pemula.
Sedangkan penerimaan formasi untuk lulusan D-III lebih banyak seperti Pengelola Keuagan, Penyusun Laporan Keuagan, Pranata Sidik Jari, Pengelola Barang Milik Negara, hingga Pengelola Keamanan dan Ketertiban. Sisanya bagi lulusan sarjana, panitia seleksi membuka sejumlah posisi untuk dilamar seperti Pengelola Pembinaan Bantuan, Arsiparis Ahli Pertama, Pranata Komputer Ahli Pertama, dan Pranata Hubungan Masyarakat Ahli Pertama.
CPNS Kemenkumham itu nantinya akan ditempatkan di Kantor Wilayah, Kantor Imigrasi, Rumah Detensi Imigrasi, Lembaga Pemasyarakatan, Rumah Tahanan Negara, Cabang Rumah Tahanan Negara, Balai Pemasyarakatan, Balai Harta Peninggalan dan Balai Diklat.
Untuk mengetahui syarat dan formasi CPNS di Kemenkumham, para pelamar bisa mengakses situs resmi kementerian yakni di: https://kemenkumham.go.id/

Ministry of Law and Human Rights Opens 4,598 Formation of CPNS 2019, See Terms
01 Nov 2019, 06:57 by Bisnis.com, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Ministry of Law and Human Rights or Kemenkumham opened admission formations for prospective civil servants or CPNS 2019. This year Kemenkumham opened 4,598 formations in various fields.
Of this total, the ministry accepted the 2019 CPNS to be placed in 14 work units. The fourteen work units in question are:
1. Secretariat General
2. Directorate General of Legislation
3. Directorate General of General Law Administration
4. Directorate General of Corrections
5. Directorate General of Immigration
6. Directorate General of Intellectual Property
7. Directorate General of Human Rights
8. Inspectorate General
9. National Legal Development Agency
10. Legal and Human Rights Research and Development Agency
11. Human Resource Law and Human Rights Development Agency
12. Correctional Polytechnic
13. Immigration Polytechnic
14. Regional Offices of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights
As for a number of regional offices of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights that open reception for CPNS 2019 are: Aceh, North Sumatra, West Sumatra, Riau, Jambi, South Sumatra, Bangka Belitung Islands, Bengkulu, Lampung and Riau Islands. In addition, other regional offices of Kemenkumham are Banten, DKI Jakarta, West Java, Central Java, D.I. Yogyakarta and East Java.
While the regional offices of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights that open reception for other 2019 CPNS are West Kalimantan, East Kalimantan, Central Kalimantan, South Kalimantan, Bali, East Nusa Tenggara, West Nusa Tenggara, Gorontalo, North Sulawesi, Central Sulawesi, South Sulawesi, Southeast Sulawesi, West Sulawesi, Maluku, North Maluku, Papua, West Papua.
The Ministry of Law and Human Rights opened 23 positions to accommodate the CPNS. Vacancies were opened for a number of graduates ranging from senior high school equivalent, D-III, Bachelor, General Practitioner and Nurse.
High school graduates also have the opportunity to take the test. Senior high school graduates can register at the same level as Guardians of the Tahana and Immigration Executors / Beginners.
While the acceptance of formation for D-III graduates is more like Financial Managers, Financial Report Drafting, Fingerprint Staffing, State Property Managers, to Security and Order Managers. The remainder for bachelor graduates, the selection committee opens a number of positions to be applied for such as Assistance Development Managers, First Expert Archivist, First Expert Computer Staff, and First Expert Public Relations Institution.
CPNS Kemenkumham will later be placed in Regional Offices, Immigration Offices, Immigration Detention Houses, Correctional Institutions, State Detention Houses, Branches of State Detention Houses, Corrections Centers, Heritage Houses and Training Centers.
To find out the requirements and formation of CPNS in Kemenkumham, applicants can access the official website of the ministry at: https://kemenkumham.go.id/
